You Should Make a Twitter Bot for Your G/L/A/M's Digital Collection(s)
item.description: Yeah, why not? Despite the bad rap some bots are (deservedly) getting, Twitter bots can either be entertaining or a source of good, especially for galleries, libraries, archives, and museums with digital collections. I've found the general public doesn't understand what cool things can be found in digital repositories and archives, much less know they exist. We can work to change that by putting our collections out there in a public setting for people to discover.
